tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
The quality of care we receive every time we come to Dr.Pradeep is awesome. We have been going to Dr.Pradeep since my son was born  and have had nothing but excellent care and have given me great advice every time I call. I imagine it will be difficult to find a practice as good as this .
I am always so impressed with the care we receive. Dr Pradeep take the time to actually get to know us and they NEVER rush through appointments. I always leave feeling better educated, confident, and reassured.
We are always happy with the care my son receive from Dr.Pradeep, thank you ! We love your practice! The doctor have been friendly, ************** professional and most importantly, genuinely interested in my son’s well-being. I recommend Dr.Pradeep every chance I get! Keep up the great work!

review: Dr pradeep is our pediatrician since the first day my son was born. He is very kind *** *** **** *** * **** **** ******* Recently my son got very sick and it was dr pradeep only who diagnosed him well on time with a very rare disease and he got proper treatment. Highly recommend him.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was really a nice experience 
Since I m staying far from hospital 
We are unable to go
So we have to select doctor who is nearby 
Just because of trust in hospital and high confidence on dr Pradeep g c sir again we approached him
After 8 months we visited hospital 
Now we are very much comfortable 
Babies are doin good
Thank u sir 
And thanks to hospital

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Appointment taken was at 12.45 .... and the actual time we met dr was at 2 apart from emergency visit to OT which is fine ... the nurses  couldn’t  manage it properly .. total mismanagement  and absolute dissatisfaction .. they don’t reply to our query .. because of them we may not go there again .
